properties.name: length
properties.description: moonpool length, along the length of the ship.

properties.name: beam
properties.description: moonpool beam, along the beam of ship.

properties.name: height
properties.description: moonpool height, along the ship draft.

properties.name: cen
properties.description: Coordinate of the center of moonpool in ship coordinate system.

properties.name: zRot
properties.description: moon-pool rotation alngle in ship around vertical direction.
